mapper.insert: INSERT INTO airspace ( id,airspace_name, status,airspace_point, start_time, end_time, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) VALUES (#{id},#{airspaceName}, #{status}, ST_GeomFromText(#{airspacePoint}), #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{gmtCreate} ,#{gmtModified})
mapper.update: UPDATE airspace SET status=1 WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.select: select id,airspace_name,ST_AsText(airspace_point) as airspace_point,start_time,end_time from airspace where status = 1 and id =#{airspaceId}
select id,airspace_name,ST_AsText(airspace_point) as airspace_point,start_time,end_time from airspace where deleted = 1 and(#{date} between start_time and end_time) and id IN #{item}
select id,airspace_name,ST_AsText(airspace_point) as airspace_point,start_time,end_time from airspace where status = 0
select id,airspace_name,ST_AsText(airspace_point) as airspace_point,start_time,end_time from airspace where status = 1 and id IN #{item}
